entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:32 a.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 0.4Â°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle mixed with freezing rain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
